pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, September 22, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, September 22, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will greet the Premier of the State Council of the People’s Republic of China, Li Keqiang at a welcoming ceremony with military honours.

Cartier Square Drill Hall
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:15 a.m.


9:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with Premier Li Keqiang.

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Official photographers only


9:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold an expanded meeting with Premier Li Keqiang.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


10:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Signing Ceremony with Premier Li Keqiang.

Hall of Honour, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


11:05 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with Premier Li Keqiang.

House of Commons Foyer, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.


Gatineau, Quebec

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will host a dinner for the Premier of the State Council of the People’s Republic of China, Li Keqiang and his wife, Madam Cheng Hong.

Canadian Museum of History
100 Laurier Street
Gatineau, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media must arrive no later than 6:15 p.m.


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
